sentence: In trading on Thursday, shares of Procter & Gamble Company (Symbol: PG) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $81.96, changing hands as high as $82.03 per share.
Procter & Gamble Company shares are currently trading up about 1.6% on the day.

The chart below shows the one year performance of PG shares, versus its 200 day moving average:

Looking at the chart above, PG's low point in its 52 week range is $70.73 per share, with $94.67 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $81.97.
